A concentrated beam of light is able of transporting a vast amount of energy that is even sufficient for melting metal.
Thanks to a few of my new discoveries I was able to further improve this method to create an extremely intense beam of light.

I achieved this through the feeding of energy into a gem that is located between two semitransparent mirrors. This way the gem is being stimulated to emit light at the right moment which creates a perfectly synchron beam of light.
